name: sudoku-cli
description: CLI tool for validating, solving, and generating Sudoku puzzles

scripts.test: npm run build && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && node dist-test/test/parser.test.js && node dist-test/test/validator.test.js && node dist-test/test/solver.test.js && node dist-test/test/generator.test.js && node dist-test/test/cli.smoke.test.js
